answers.answer: I was 2 cm with my last son and had to be induced because he just didn't want to come ..lol... there is nothing to worry about.. they start an iv and get things rolling I have to warn you it does hurt more then natural labor because of the medication but I am sure you are going to be fine.. if you plan on pain management I would have a plan of when you want it during your labor. I did get the epidural 7 hours into labor and had my son 2 hours after I got the epidural..

I was induced 8 days after my due date with my son. He was born the next day. Everything went pretty smoothly but it was painful as hell. But the pain is over as soon as you have the baby. That was almost 11 years ago. I'm now 38 weeks with a girl and hoping to go into labor naturally. Good luck. You'll be fine.

This same scenario happened with my 1st born. There are health risks involved for mom and baby if baby is born too late. My body could no longer properly nourish my baby and my blood pressure was sky high. That was scary. My Dr said induction was the answer. I went in at 8am and had my son at 3:04pm that same day. It wasn't bad. And my baby was fine. Now he's a perfectly heathy 2 1/2 year old.

I was induced with my first bc of preeclampsia and i was able to get epi at 4cm and the rest was a breeze. I feel your pain, im stuck at 1cm and cervix was still hi last tuesday. My due date was yesterday, doc has scheduled me to be induced monday morning.

I was induced with my second kid he was a week over due and he didnt want to come out but I wasn't dilated so it took 10 hours of labor I just hope with one he comes out without me having to be included again

Omg,same thing is happening to me.Same date.I'm scared to.Planed to have birth without epidural,but now I don't think that's good idea.Boys are little lazy and like to stay longer in belly.Hope everything will come out good for both of us.

question: I was due on January 21st and I'm a FTM with no signs of labor (dilated to only a 1 for over a month). My doctor says my baby is doing everything she is suppose to but my body isn't responding correctly. Because of this, my doctor has set an induction date of January 28th and I'm terrified! I guess I'm just afraid and hoping someone has a positive story similar to mine. :(
title: Afraid of Induction
